H0.text: What name besides glove is given commonly to a baseball player's handwear. Paw

H1.text: What name besides glove is given commonly to a baseball player's handwear. Catcher

H2.text: What name besides glove is given commonly to a baseball player's handwear. Grasp

H3.text: What name besides glove is given commonly to a baseball player's handwear. Mitt

A4.text: Catcher's mitts are also referred to as mitts
